Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.controller

Class ControllerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.controller.ControllerState
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseSetUpState, DrawnCardState, EndGameState, ForcedEndState, InitState, PlacedCardState, WaitPlayerState
public abstract class ControllerState extends Object
Abstract class representing a state in the game controller's state machine. Different states handle different phases of the game and interact with clients accordingly.

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat(String clientId, String message, Player sender, Player receiver)
      Updates the game's chat with a new message and sends a chat event to all clients.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The client identifier.
      message - The message content.
      sender - The player sending the message.
      receiver - The intended receiver of the message (can be null for broadcast).
